main event: The observer sighted an object that looked like a metallic baseball with a circle around it. The object's movement was very sluggish and appeared to be on a hydrails electric circuit.
interesting points: The object had one side that was a little different than the other.
The object failed to respond to the investigator's request.
The investigator concluded that the sighting was psychological in nature.
The report includes a handwritten sketch or diagram of the object.
The report mentions that the object was observed for approximately 15 seconds to 1-2 minutes, moving in a westerly direction at an estimated speed of 1,000 to 12,000 miles per hour.
sighted object: a metallic baseball-shaped object with a circle around it
